Screenwriter: Arnaud Desplechin, Léa Mysius, Julie Peyr
Synopsis: Twenty-one years ago, she ran away -- and 21 years later, Carlotta is back from the void. But Ismael has been busy rebuilding a life for himself with Sylvia and working on his next movie. As Ismael's trials and tribulations unfurl, so too do those of his film's protagonist -- the idle, funny and reckless diplomat Ivan Dédalus.
Title: Ismael's Ghosts
